e2e_encryption.description: Requirement for meetings to be encrypted using AES.

private_chat.description: Enable private chat message between meeting participants.

file_transfer.description: Enable file sharing via in-meeting chat.

feedback.description: Feedback enabled for users to provide meeting feedback.

post_meeting_feedback.description: A thumbs up or down survey enabled at the end of a meeting.

co_host.description: Setting for host to add co-hosts.

polling.description: Polls added to the meeting controls.

attendee_on_hold.description: Allow hosts to temporarily remove an attendee from a meeting.

show_meeting_control_toolbar.description: Always show the meeting control bar.

allow_show_zoom_windows.description: Show the Zoom desktop application when sharing access.

annotation.description: Allow participants to use annotation tools to add information to shared screens.

whiteboard.description: Allow participants to share a whiteboard that includes annotation tools.

anonymous_question_answer.description: Allow an anonymous Q&A during a webinar.

breakout_room.description: Allow host to split meeting participants into separate, smaller rooms.

closed_caption.description: Enable a host to add closed captions.

far_end_camera_control.description: Another user enabled to take control of camera during a meeting.

group_hd.description: Enable higher quality video for host and participants.

virtual_background.description: Enable users to change their background.

watermark.description: Add watermark when viewing a shared screen.

alert_guest_join.description: Alert when a guest joins a meeting.

auto_answer.description: Enable users to see and add contacts to the \"auto-answer group\" in the chat contact list. Any call from members of this group will automatically be answered.

p2p_connetion.description: Peer to peer connection while only two people are in a meeting.

p2p_ports.description: Peer to peer listening ports range.

ports_range.description: The listening ports range, separated by a comma (ex 55,56). The ports range must be between 1 to 65535.

sending_default_email_invites.description: Only show the default email when sending email invites.

use_html_format_email.description: Use HTML formatted email for the Outlook plugin.

stereo_audio.description: Allow users to select stereo audio in their client settings.

original_audio.description: Allow users to select original sound in their client settings.

remote_control.description: Allow users to request remote control.

attention_tracking.description: Allows the host to see an indicator in the participant panel if a meeting or webinar attendee does not have Zoom in focus while screen sharing.
